page.title: 18WOOBURN GREEN-FESTIVAL
page.content: Each year in September an Arts Festival is held.For two weeks,plays are acted, at concerts of classical music and song are performed by professional and amateur musicians.Jazz concerts are held,master classes for instrumental- ists and most enjoyable poetry readings .A few famous artists draw crowds from surrounding areas. Concerts have been held in the Tithe Barn and in the church.An exhibition of local artists' work in oils,water colours,sculpture and photography is held.The Festival started as a local project,using local talent,but over the years has become much larger, incorporating performers from London and so some items have to be performed in larger halls,outside the parish.
